message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice,  $200 is a bit too steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to pay $80 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $200 represents the value of the product, I'm willing to come down to $170 for you.  What do you think?
Alice,  $170 is still a little out of my price range. I'm willing to go up to $100, but that's my absolute limit.  Let me know if that works for you.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints but $100 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $135? This is my final offer.
